A user or system defines a high-level objective eg. generate and send weekly sales report
The agent collects relevant data from connected tools (e.g., CRM, email, databases, APIs) to understand the context of the task.
Using a Large Language Model (LLM), the agent breaks down the goal into sub-tasks, decides the optimal sequence, and determines the tools or data sources required.
The agent executes each task step-by-step—writing emails, querying databases, updating records, or generating content.
Agents track their own progress, detect errors or exceptions, and retry or adjust strategies as needed—without human intervention.
APA systems can learn from past interactions and optimize performance over time, using reinforcement learning or human feedback (RLHF).
